report.title: Occurrence images list for warehouse user
report.description: A general purpose list of record images, filtered by user ID from the warehouse.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN occurrence_images oi ON oi.occurrence_id=o.id AND oi.deleted=false JOIN samples s ON s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted = FALSE JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND o.media_count>0 AND o.created_by_id=#created_by_id# #filters#
report.field_sql: o.id as occurrence_id, oi.path, oi.caption, o.sample_id, o.location_name, s.entered_sref, o.date_start, o.date_end, o.date_type, cttl.id as taxa_taxon_list_id, cttl.preferred_taxon as taxon, cttl.default_common_name as common, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as species, cttl.taxon_group as taxon_group, o.zero_abundance

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: date_from
param.where: ('#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: date_to
param.where: ('#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: taxon_group_id
param.description: Select the taxon group to return data for, or leave for all groups
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM taxon_groups

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: created_by_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the warehouse user
